title: How can I retain line-feeds when editing my emergency information?
content:
I have various information, such as my address and medications, on my Pixel 2XL.

Settings > About phone > Emergency information

My details were added some time ago. The address and medical fields include line-feeds, meaning that each address line is on a separate line, and likewise for each medication. This is easy to read in an emergency (which is the whole point).

Now, when I go to edit the information, I'm presented with everything on a long, single line, with spaces replacing the line-feeds. There is no way to insert line-feeds.

How do I keep the line-feeds? Or, to put it another way, how do I keep each medication on a separate line, the way that it used to be?

Thank you
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
